body_html:
@ebrevdo on the note of numerical precision comparison ... done! see the tests, it compares the results w the existing for the fprop and bprop (i.e., using build graph of BasicLSTMCell and build graph of the monolithic op, run graphs + compare results... i.e., i basically copied to rnn dynamic vs static test that u wrote).

however the test doesn't compare the states, my monolithic state is a bit different than the existing state, i.e., my state contains all the gate activations as well as the c and the h, while iirc the BasicLSTMCell state only has the c and the h. i did compare the state in the fprop (see test in the rnn_cell_test, but not the grad for the backprop (at least not explicitly, implicitly we do via the other grads).
